name: Extreme Ledge Holding
description:
Extreme Ledge Holding 

Extreme Ledge Holding  is an platform fighter without any platforms. Created during the UW GDC game jam by just me!

Features three characters and exciting multiplayer combat, as you battle to control the ledge!

ONE XBOX CONTROLLER REQUIRED

Controls:

P1:  Xbox controls also work (See P2)

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space: Jump

J: Recovery

H: Attack 1

K: Attack 2

P2: Xbox stick to move

A: Jump

Y: Recovery

X: Attack 1

Y: Attack 2

Version  0.9.1

A game by Sam Long  - twitter
